ðŸ“– Summary: BRS-XSS is a command-line XSS scanner designed for security professionals. It offers features like context-aware scanning, WAF detection & bypass, intelligent classification, and professional reporting. The tool supports asynchronous scanning, web crawling, and DOM XSS analysis, making it a comprehensive solution for identifying XSS vulnerabilities.
